author: Vivienne Clarke, Paul Cullen
title: Coronavirus: Next seven days ‘crucial’ in containing outbreak
description: We will be living with virus for quite some period of time and we have to adapt – Prof Nolan
content:
The Chair of the Irish Epidemiological Modelling Advisory Group and a member of the National Public Health Emergency Team (NPHET), Professor Philip Nolan has said that the next seven days will be crucial as an indication if coronavirus is being contained.
